channel.title: Comments on: Graphic Blandishment? What’s That?

item.title: By: Me
item.dc:creator: Me
item.description:
bland·ish·ment/ˈblandiSHmənt/ Noun: A flattering or pleasing statement or action used to persuade someone gently to do something.
Glad I could help.
item.content:encoded:
bland·ish·ment/ˈblandiSHmənt/
Noun:
A flattering or pleasing statement or action used to persuade someone gently to do something.

Glad I could help.

item.title: By: login
item.dc:creator: login
item.description: Definitely appreciate you discussing this article. Great!!
item.content:encoded: Definitely appreciate you discussing this article. Great!!

item.title: By: K.B.
item.dc:creator: K.B.
item.description:
It wasn't Schultz that came up with the term, and there's no evidence that Schultz was not a fan of "hand drawn motion pictures".
It was Bill Melendez, the director and head animator, who came up with the "graphic blandishment" credit. Instead of crediting the animation artists by specific jobs done, he preferred to just lump all of the artists into one grouping.
item.content:encoded:
It wasn’t Schultz that came up with the term, and there’s no evidence that Schultz was not a fan of “hand drawn motion pictures”.

It was Bill Melendez, the director and head animator, who came up with the “graphic blandishment” credit. Instead of crediting the animation artists by specific jobs done, he preferred to just lump all of the artists into one grouping.
